mapper.select: select M.match_no, M.match_title, M.member_code, M.interesting_code, M.local_code, M.place_name, M.place_lat, M.place_lng, M.matching_type, to_char(M.match_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') match_end_date, M.match_renamed_img, A.nickname, I.interesting_name, L.local_name , C.city_name, (select count(*) from matching_join_member where match_no = M.match_no and join_check = 'Y' and permit_check = 'Y') member_count, M.match_content from match_manager M left join member A on M.member_code = A.member_code left join interesting I on M.interesting_code = I.interesting_code left join local L on M.local_code = L.local_code left join city C on L.city_code = C.city_code where matching_type = 'L' and M.member_code = #{memberCode} order by match_no desc
